Control Name: 4.3 Ensure that security policies and operational procedures for encrypting transmissions of cardholder data are documented, in use, and known to all affected parties.

control_attributes.Control: 4.3 Ensure that security policies and operational procedures for encrypting transmissions of cardholder data are documented, in use, and known to all affected parties.
control_attributes.Requirement: Requirement 4: Encrypt transmission of cardholder data across open, public networks
